story:
Once upon a time, in a small village in Mexico, there lived a kind and courageous young girl named Maria. Maria had a heart as vast as the open skies above and a spirit as bright as the sun that painted the horizon every morning.

One beautiful evening, as Maria lay down to sleep, she closed her eyes and drifted off into a dream world full of magic and wonder. In her dream, Maria found herself in a lush, colorful garden filled with blooming flowers and shimmering fireflies that danced in the night.

As she strolled through the garden, Maria came across a majestic tree with branches reaching up to the stars. The tree whispered stories of faraway lands and enchanted creatures that sparked the imagination of the young girl.

Suddenly, Maria heard a soft rustling sound and turned to see a graceful butterfly fluttering towards her. The butterfly landed on her outstretched hand and whispered a message of hope and resilience, reminding Maria of her own inner strength and the power of believing in herself.

Filled with newfound confidence, Maria set off on an adventure through the dream garden, overcoming obstacles with bravery and compassion. Along the way, she met a wise owl who shared words of wisdom and encouragement, guiding her on her journey.

As the night waned and dawn approached, Maria found herself standing at the edge of a shimmering lake reflecting the first light of the morning sun. With a heart full of gratitude and a soul renewed with wonder, Maria bid farewell to the dream world and woke up in her bed, ready to embrace the new day ahead.

And so, dear daughter, remember the story of Maria and the dream garden, for it holds the magic of believing in yourself and the beauty of seeking adventure with an open heart. May you always sleep peacefully, knowing that you are loved and cherished beyond measure.

Goodnight, my precious one. Sleep well and dream sweet dreams.
